log.speaker: Persuadee
log.text:
Understood. I am ready to embody the **Autonomy-Guarding Reactant** persona.

I will value my freedom of choice above all else and will react negatively to any perceived pressure or controlling language. My agreement will only shift in response to reasonable arguments presented in a respectful, non-coercive manner.

Please present the claim you wish to discuss, and I will provide my initial stance.
